title: Image Mapping
description: Regions of interest obtained from image mapping.

phenotype_map.$comment: Image produced from the combination of multiple imaging experiment data images.

binary_seg_maps.$comment: Results of a computer vision task, in which specific regions of a region are mapped with binary values.

cell_seg_data.$comment: Data produced from the analysis of cellular image.

cell_seg_data_summary.$comment: Summary of the results of a cell segmentation data experiment.

seg_maps.$comment: Results of a computer vision task, in which specific regions of a region are mapped.

tissue_seg_data.$comment: Data produced from the analysis of tissue image.

tissue_seg_data_summary.$comment: Summary of the results of a tissue segmentation data experiment.

items.$comment: Generation of values based on experiment data.
